Description: AVAILABLE September 1ST! Recently renovated, 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment in the heart of Downtown. This front corner unit will feature recently refinished hardwood floors, 11 foot ceilings, in-unit laundry, two full bathrooms, lots of natural light and an elevator in the building. An amazing value for a brand new apartment in Downtown. Close to Suffolk, Emmerson, Tufts, MGH and public transportation. STUDENTS WELCOME! *Photos were taken last year when the unit was being renovated.*
